title: Tuberculosis patients with diabetes co-morbidity experience reduced Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex clearance
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Emelia Konadu Danso, Prince Asare, Stephen Osei-Wusu, Phillip Tetteh, Amanda Yaa Tetteh, Augustine Asare Boadu, Ivy Naa Koshie Lamptey, Augustina Angelina Sylverken, Kwasi Obiri-Danso, Jane Afriyie Mensah, Abraham Adjei, Dorothy Yeboah-Manu
